description: This file defines React components for various types of charts using the Recharts library. It includes components like TrendLineChart, MultiSeriesLineChart, StackedBarChart, and PieBreakdownChart, which are designed to visualize different data trends and distributions within a UI.

methods.name: TrendLineChart({ data, dataKey = "value", xKey = "date", color = "#374151", gradient = false, height = 220 })
methods.description: A simple trend line or area chart component with optional gradient fill, used to display time-series data.

methods.name: MultiSeriesLineChart({ data, xKey = "date", series = [ { key: "aws", label: "AWS", color: "#F59E0B" },  { key: "azure", label: "Azure", color: "#3B82F6" },  { key: "gcp", label: "GCP", color: "#10B981" },  ], height = 260, showLegend = true, })
methods.description: A multi-series line chart component that displays multiple datasets with a legend for source comparison.

methods.name: StackedBarChart({ data, keys, colors, xKey = "name", height = 260, legend = true })
methods.description: A stacked bar chart for comparing categorical data across different groups or providers.

methods.name: PieBreakdownChart({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })
methods.description: A pie chart component for displaying proportional category shares with customizable colors.

ctags.name: MultiSeriesLineChart
ctags.signature: ({ data, xKey = "date", series = [ { key: "aws", label: "AWS", color: "#F59E0B" },  { key: "azure", label: "Azure", color: "#3B82F6" },  { key: "gcp", label: "GCP", color: "#10B981" },  ], height = 260, showLegend = true, })

ctags.signature: ({ data, dataKey = "value", nameKey = "name", colors = DEFAULT_COLORS, height = 260, innerRadius = 60 })
